ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought anything that provided entertainment via word or song was considered automatically on topic for bards?  Maybe not.  I know I appreciate it,
ygData.messageBody:
I thought anything that provided entertainment via word or song was
considered automatically on topic for bards? Maybe not. I know I
appreciate it, especially in light of the evidence of our continued
perpetual nerfing.

Kitasi
Solidarity!
Rodney King! Rodney King!

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 4:10 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing


From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>

Llamas?! Cuidado Llamas!

Umm, isn't this considered off-topic now or is this actually valid bard
information? Not that I mind, I need some stress relief and this is helping
to provide it by being a change from the depression of bard nerfs and
inferiority of bard-only stuff. =)

Now Bard only cow-armor (white with black spots and an udder) would be cool.
Or maybe not. Umm, nevermind.

---Windleaf, 23rd level Bard on Bertox
